Body:
template = """
        ## comment
        % if foo:
            hi
        % endif
        <%text>
            # more code

            % more code
            <%illegal compionent>/></>
            <%def name="laal()">def</%def>


        </%text>

        <%def name="foo()">this is foo</%def>

        % if bar:
            code
        % endif
        """
node = Lexer(template).parse()
self._compare(node, TemplateNode({}, [Text('\n', (1, 1)), Comment('comment',
    (2, 1)), ControlLine('if', 'if foo:', False, (3, 1)), Text(
    '            hi\n', (4, 1)), ControlLine('if', 'endif', True, (5, 1)),
    Text('        ', (6, 1)), TextTag('text', {}, (6, 9), [Text(
    """
            # more code

            % more code
            <%illegal compionent>/></>
            <%def name="laal()">def</%def>


        """
    , (6, 16))]), Text('\n\n        ', (14, 17)), DefTag('def', {'name':
    'foo()'}, (16, 9), [Text('this is foo', (16, 28))]), Text('\n\n', (16, 
    46)), ControlLine('if', 'if bar:', False, (18, 1)), Text(
    """            code
""", (19, 1)), ControlLine('if', 'endif', True, (20,
    1)), Text('        ', (21, 1))]))
